summary: A grief-stricken man takes the law into his own hands when he begins to kidnap and murder corrupt public servants.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Kareena Kapoor|Shruti Haasan|Chitrangda Singh|Jaideep Ahlawat|Shruti Bapna|Sunil Grover|Suman|Ishita Vyas|Sanjay Gurbaxani|Krishna Raaz|Deepjyoti Das|Anandeshwar Dwivedi|Parihar Ruby|Hetal Puniwala|Pravina Bhagwat Deshpande|Jagdish Rajpurohit|Sai Ballal|Vikas Shrivastav|Rajiv Kachroo|Jitendra Trehan|Anuradha Chandan|Raj Singh Arora|Rajiv Ranjan|Uttam Halder|Anil Kumar|Chandra Prakash Thakur|Narendra Jetley|Harmanpreet Kaur|Prateek Srivastava|Anoop Puri|Ashish Gokhale|Anil Rai Mani|Robin Chaudhary
title: Gabbar Is Back
